about.desc: We don't just create projects, we create new opportunities. By building state-scale facilities, we are building the future. We care about the environment: the company takes full responsibility for the environmental aspects related to the construction and operation of buildings and infrastructure.

icon1.desc: The company recruits experienced employees on a competitive basis

icon2.desc: By looking at the great work we have done through our website, you will be sure that we have earned the trust of our customers

icon3.desc: We perform our mission carefully and appreciate your belief in our company All mistakes were clearly corrected

card1.desc: This is a large-scale socially significant project. The cultural and entertainment cluster in Tashkent is one of the new attractions.

card2.desc: Multifunctional residential complex created to provide comfort to the residents of Uzbekistan.

card3.desc: A grandiose residential area in the heart of the capital.

card4.desc: Fonon is a jewelry production plant in Uzbekistan built on the basis of Italian ones in 2020. Fonon is the only large enterprise in Central Asia producing jewelry from precious metals in European and Oriental styles,

card5.desc: International kindergarten and school located in the international business center of Tashkent City.

card6.desc: This is an educational institution that provides knowledge at an international level
